qas.question: What mass murder did Bozize commit?
How many people were displaced in the unrests?
What faction was fighting against the remaining Bozize loyalists?

plausible_answers.text: crimes against humanity and incitement of genocide.

qas.question: What were the indictments against Michel Djotokia?
During what time did human rights abuses not improve?

context: <a0_0>Michel Djotodia<a0_0/> took over as president and <b7_0>in May 2013<b7_0/> Central African Republic's Prime Minister Nicolas Tiangaye requested a UN peacekeeping force from the UN Security Council and on 31 May former President Bozizé was indicted for <a1_0><b8_0>crimes against humanity<a1_0/> and incitement of <a2_0>genocide<a2_0/>.<b8_0/> The security situation did not improve <b9_0>during June–August 2013<b9_0/> and there were reports of <b5_0>over <a3_0>200,000<b5_0/><a3_0/> internally displaced persons (IDPs) as well as human rights abuses and renewed fighting between <a4_0><b6_0>Séléka<a4_0/> and Bozizé supporters<b6_0/>.
